dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, February 05, 2005 12:41 AM
To: fish
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] RE: Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

fish wrote:
| Hi Mike,
|
| Thank you for sending this out.
|
| Best regards,
| -Fish
|
| -----Original Message-----
| From: piratekiller@nukepirates.com [mailto:piratekiller@nukepirates.com]
| Sent: Friday, February 04, 2005 4:36 PM
| To: abuse@theplanet.com
| Cc: Tori Porter
| Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA
|
| Internet Copyright Enforcement
| P.O. Box 11133
| Bakersfield, CA 93389-1133
| (661) 665-8157  E-mail:  Piratekiller@NukePirates.com
|
| February 4, 2005
|
| DMCA Notice #: 020405-05
|
| re: Warez CD Store
| http://www.indiasoft.info/loja/default.php?cPath=20_13
| IP# 69.93.84.26
|
| ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
|
| I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
| authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
| rights, said owners being named:
|
| Curious Labs, Inc., Santa Cruz, California, USA
|
| I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are
| not authorized by the above IP Owners, their agents, or the law and
| therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights. Please act expeditiously to
| remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be
| infringing.
|
| I may be contacted at:
|
| Printed Name: Michael Watso
| Title:  Copyright Agent
| Company: Internet Copyright Enforcement
| Street Address:  PO Box 11133
| City and State:  Bakersfield, CA
| Zip:  93389-1133
| Email (correspondence):  PirateKiller@NukePirates.com
| Telephone:  (661) 665-8157
| Fax:  (661) 665-8157
|
| Truthfully,
| /S/: Michael Watso
|
| Allegedly Infringing items or materials:
|
| Infringed Work or Right:
| Poser 4
| Poser 5
|
| Original Materials & Copyright Holder(s):
|
| Copyrighted materials belonging to Curious Labs, Inc.:
| Location of ORIGINAL WORKS:
| http://www.curiouslabs.com/
|
| URL(s) of Infringed Works or Right:
| http://www.indiasoft.info/loja/default.php?cPath=20_13
| http://www.indiasoft.info/loja/images/Poser4.jpg
| http://www.indiasoft.info/loja/images/Poser_5.gif
| Unless otherwise indicated, the information in this transmittal is
| CONFIDENTIAL and intended only for the recipient listed above. If you are
| not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery
| of the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message
| to anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify
| the sender by reply mail.
|
|
|
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
